name: Monkey King: Master of the Clouds | 中華大仙
description: Join Micheal Chang, the Monkey King, on his journey through famous landmarks of ancient China and fight off mythical creatures and legends in this classic arcade shooter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: intel HD4000 with 1GB of VRAM or comparable DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
